description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Local multiplayer only! A twin stick shooter you can play against the friends you hate most. 3 extras, 5 stages, one of them pink. A friend of mine got sweaty palms so the game must have some qualities. Get it now so that I can buy a nice present for my mom.
